TopicTitle: SSTO for crew transfer - works in 1.0

Articles.Content:
So here it is: My first working SSTO in KSP 1.0

Get up to 10k with about 70% throttle, flatten a bit and hit 100%, wait till flameout (about 28k), switch to rocket mode up until AP is higher than 70k, coast to AP and switch off the outer Rapiers, circularize.

Should be good for orbits of 72k, but I am pretty sure a lot of you could do even better ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2PklgwTXgVI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Craft File: [http://www./download/ab5wvhw3d3cgjyw/SSTO_Crew_I.craft](http://www./download/ab5wvhw3d3cgjyw/SSTO_Crew_I.craft)
